ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] instrument skill
ygData.msgSnippet: You should try to keep all your skills maxed.  For weapons it helps you hit and for instruments it allows successful playing of your notes (and better
ygData.messageBody:
You should try to keep all your skills maxed. For weapons it helps you hit and for instruments it allows successful playing of your notes (and better twisting). You'll see this very clearly at level 18 when you get your first brass song...
Aaron King <king_aaron@...> wrote: Hey,
why should your instrument skill be maxed? Do you play the song better? I use hymm of restore a lot, will having max skill in that istrument help me heal more or faster? Thanks in advance for any help Get more from the Web. FREE MSN Explorer download : http://explorer.msn.com
